TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScaffoldTableAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定類別或資料的資料表 (Data Table) 是否使用 Scaffolding。

span.span: Specifies whether a class or data table uses scaffolding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Scaffolding 可用來產生資料庫結構描述為基礎的網頁範本的機制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET Dynamic Data 使用 scaffolding 產生 Web 式 UI，可讓使用者檢視並更新資料庫。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 這個類別會使用屬性，以啟用 scaffolding 的個別資料表中 Dynamic Data 網站。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding of individual tables in a Dynamic Data Web Site. Scaffolding 會動態顯示基礎資料模型，與任何所需的實體頁面的頁面，以增強 ASP.NET 網頁架構。Scaffolding enhances the ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. Scaffolding 提供下列功能：Scaffolding provides the following: - 最少或沒有程式碼來建立資料驅動 Web 應用程式。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 快速的開發時間。Quick development time. - 可完全正常運作，包括顯示、 insert、 編輯、 刪除、 排序和分頁功能的網頁。Pages that are fully functional, including display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 根據資料庫結構描述的內建的資料驗證。Built-in data validation based on the database schema. - 篩選條件所建立的每個外部索引鍵或布林值欄位。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 這個類別可以用來啟用或停用資料模型中資料表的資料 scaffolding 將這個屬性套用至部分類別，表示資料表中。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data tables in a data model by applying this attribute to the partial class that represents the table. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會藉由套用至錯誤記錄檔部分類別，表示 ErrorLog 資料表的 scaffold 屬性隱藏 ErrorLog 資料表 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫中。The following code example hides the ErrorLog Table in AdventureWorksLT database by applying the scaffold attribute to the ErrorLog partial class that represents the ErrorLog table. Scaffold 屬性設定為 `false.`The scaffold property is set to `false.` ```csharp [MetadataType (typeof(ErrorLogMetada))] [ScaffoldTable(false)] public partial class ErrorLog { } public class ErrorLogMetada { } ``` ```vb _ Public Partial Class ErrorLog End Class Public Class ErrorLogMetada End Class ``` 若要編譯範例程式碼，您需要下列項目：To compile the example code, you need the following: - Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 或 Visual Developer 2008 Express Edition Service Pack 1。Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 or Visual Developer 2008 Express Edition Service Pack 1. - AdventureWorksLT 範例資料庫中。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 如需有關如何下載並安裝 SQL Server 範例資料庫的資訊，請參閱 < [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 請確定您已安裝您正在執行的 SQL server 版本的範例資料庫的正確版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - Dynamic Data 網站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 這可讓您建立資料庫和包含要自訂的資料欄位的類別和方法來覆寫的資料內容。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外，它會建立使用頁面之前所述的環境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立新動態資料網站上使用 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

related.span: 逐步解說： 建立新動態資料網站上使用 Scaffolding

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool scaffold) cil managed

param.name: scaffold
param.span: 指定是否啟用 Scaffolding 的值。

span.span: The value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

summary.span: 使用 屬性，初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定`scaffold`要`true`整個資料模型公開 （expose） 所有 CRUD （建立、 讀取、 更新和刪除） 作業的資料庫中的資料表，或藉由設定都公開至 CRUD 作業的個別資料表`scaffold`針對至個別資料表`true`.You can set `scaffold` to `true` for the entire data model to expose all data tables in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations or expose individual tables to CRUD operations by setting `scaffold` for individual tables to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scaffold As Boolean
public: property bool Scaffold { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定是否啟用 Scaffolding。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用 Scaffolding，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Scaffolding 會產生資料庫結構描述為基礎的網頁範本的機制。Scaffolding is the mechanism of generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET Dynamic Data 使用 scaffolding 產生 Web 式 UI，可讓使用者檢視並更新資料庫。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 如需有關 Scaffold 屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the Scaffold attribute, see .
